company.name: HLPFL Records
company.description: HLPFL Records is a premier record label dedicated to discovering, developing, and promoting exceptional musical talent. With over 15 years of experience in the music industry, we've built a reputation for nurturing artists and creating groundbreaking music that resonates globally.
core_values: Artist-First approach - We prioritize our artists' creative vision and career development above all else
Excellence - We pursue the highest standards in music production, marketing, and artist support
Collaboration - We believe in the power of collaboration between artists, producers, and our team
Innovation - We embrace new technologies and creative approaches to push musical boundaries
Global Reach - We connect local talent with global audiences through strategic partnerships
Long-Term Success - We focus on building sustainable careers, not just short-term hits
